children.name: Sentence 13
children.text: 侯王毋已貴以高將恐厥

children.name: Sentence 16
children.text: 是以侯王自謂孤寡不穀

children.name: Sentence 4
children.text: 吾是以智無爲之有益也

children.name: Sentence 0
children.text: 江海之所以能爲百谷王者

children.name: Sentence 12
children.text: 是以天下樂推而弗厭也

children.name: Sentence 6
children.text: 是以聖人自智而不自見也

children.name: Sentence 12
children.text: 孰能有餘而有取奉於天者

children.name: Sentence 1
children.text: 而功堅强者莫之能失也

children.name: Sentence 1
children.text: 使有什佰人之氣而勿用

children.name: Sentence 8
children.text: 天地之所以能長且久者

children.name: Sentence 11
children.text: 是以聖人後其身而身先

children.name: Sentence 6
children.text: 是以聖人執一以爲天下牧

children.name: Sentence 17
children.text: 我谷不谷而民自[(木(菐臣s)z)]

children.name: Sentence 7
children.text: 是以[曰來s]是以[曰來s]備，`覈查原文

children.name: Sentence 14
children.text: 是古聖人能尃萬勿之自肰

children.name: Sentence 17
children.text: 我谷不谷而民自[(木(菐臣s)z)]

children.name: Sentence 14
children.text: 是古聖人能尃萬勿之自肰

children.name: Sentence 7
children.text: 是以[曰來s]是以[曰來s]備，`覈查原文

children.name: Sentence 14
children.text: 是以能榑[土萬]勿之自肰

children.name: Sentence 16
children.text: 夫是以侯王自胃孤寡不𥞤

children.name: Sentence 7
children.text: 夫莫之[(既旡-)寸z]而恒自然也

children.name: Sentence 8
children.text: 適=斤亡吾吾葆矣。`有訛字

children.name: Sentence 12
children.text: 孰能有餘而有以取奉於天者乎

children.name: Sentence 11
children.text: 是以聲人芮其身而身先

children.name: Sentence 6
children.text: 是以聲人執一以爲天下牧

children.name: Sentence 13
children.text: 侯王毋已貴以高將恐欮

children.name: Sentence 16
children.text: 夫是以侯王自胃孤寡不𥞤

children.name: Sentence 6
children.text: 是以𦔻人自知而不自見也

children.name: Sentence 12
children.text: 夫孰能又余而□□奉於天者

children.name: Sentence 8
children.text: 天地之所以能長且久者

children.name: Sentence 6
children.text: 是以𦔻人執一以爲天下牧

children.name: Sentence 16
children.text: 是以侯王自謂孤寡不穀

children.name: Sentence 4
children.text: 是以萬物莫不尊道而貴德

children.name: Sentence 0
children.text: 江海所以能爲百谷王者

children.name: Sentence 8
children.text: 是以聖人處上而民不重

children.name: Sentence 11
children.text: 是以聖人後其身而身先

children.name: Sentence 6
children.text: 是以聖人抱一爲天下式

children.name: Sentence 19
children.text: 則不可以得志於天下矣

children.name: Sentence 16
children.text: 是以侯王自謂（稱）孤寡不轂（穀

children.name: Sentence 4
children.text: 是以萬物莫不尊道而貴德

children.name: Sentence 0
children.text: 江海所以能爲百谷王者

children.name: Sentence 8
children.text: 是以聖人處上而民不重

children.name: Sentence 1
children.text: 而攻堅强者莫知〈之〉能勝

children.name: Sentence 11
children.text: 是以聖人後其身而身先

children.name: Sentence 6
children.text: 是以聖人抱一爲天下式

children.name: Sentence 3
children.text: 善閉無關揵（楗）而不可開

children.name: Sentence 19
children.text: 則不可以得志於天下矣

children.name: Sentence 13
children.text: 侯王無以爲正而貴高將恐蹷

children.name: Sentence 0
children.text: 江海所以能爲百谷王者

children.name: Sentence 1
children.text: 使人有什伯之器而不用

children.name: Sentence 11
children.text: 是以聖人後其身而身先

children.name: Sentence 6
children.text: 是以聖人抱一爲天下式

children.name: Sentence 6
children.text: 如何萬乘之主以身輕天下

children.name: Sentence 13
children.text: 王侯無以爲貞而貴高將恐蹷

children.name: Sentence 16
children.text: 是以王侯自謂孤寡不穀

children.name: Sentence 4
children.text: 吾是以知無爲之有益也

children.name: Sentence 4
children.text: 是以萬物莫不尊道而貴德

children.name: Sentence 12
children.text: 古之所以貴此道者何也

children.name: Sentence 0
children.text: 江海所以能爲百谷王者

children.name: Sentence 8
children.text: 是以聖人處之上而民弗重

children.name: Sentence 6
children.text: 是以聖人自知而不自見

children.name: Sentence 12
children.text: 孰能損有餘而奉不足於天下者

children.name: Sentence 1
children.text: 使民有什伯之器而不用也

children.name: Sentence 16
children.text: 使民至老死不相與往來

children.name: Sentence 11
children.text: 是以聖人後其身而身先

children.name: Sentence 12
children.text: 孰能濁以澄靖之而徐清

children.name: Sentence 14
children.text: 孰能安以久動之而徐生

children.name: Sentence 31
children.text: 此三者以爲文而未足也

children.name: Sentence 3
children.text: 善閉者無關鍵而不可開

children.name: Sentence 5
children.text: 善結者無繩約而不可解
